metadata.dc:author: Zarranz, A
metadata.dc:description: There are here described eight medical preparations of dental use appearing in Manduti's list of prescriptions, attributed to the Portuguese physician Salvador de Sosa Revello y Mandoutt, special person who worked as a physician in several countries of South America in the end of the 18th century. In spite of the fact that his diplomas and professional abilities are of a doubtful authenticity, his list of prescriptions, lacking of scientific value, was edited eleven times up to 1904 and is still of interest for historians.
metadata.dc:title: Odontolog√≠a popular en el recetario del Dr. Manduti.
[Popular dentistry in the drug registry of Dr. Manduti].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista del Museo de la Facultad de Odontologia de Buenos Aires
